sentences.en: 6--biological urge to maim, and maul, and…
sentences.cn: 生理上的冲动去伤害，残害，并且…

sentences.en: A frightened bear will maul campers.
sentences.cn: 受惊的熊会把野营者咬伤的.

sentences.en: A man that beareth false witness against his neighbour [is] a maul, and a sword, and a sharp arrow.
sentences.cn: 作假见证陷害邻舍的，就是大槌，是利刀，是快箭。

sentences.en: Blindside - from a set piece , ruck or maul , the short side of the field.
sentences.cn: 小边(也叫弱侧), 与大边(强侧)对应.

sentences.en: Creating a standout Android phone would not only be difficult given the experience of other companies but because it could get lost in the maul of Android phones available.
sentences.cn: 不仅打造一款杰出的Android系统手机很难给其他公司带来相关经验，并且Android手机的续航时间也遭到大家的大量抨击。

sentences.en: I am sending my apprentice, Darth Maul, to join you.
sentences.cn: 我会派我的徒弟, 达孜摩罗跟你们一起去.

sentences.en: Mangle ( Feral ): Now increases the damage done by Maul in addition to Shred.
sentences.cn: 裂伤 ( 野性 ): 现在增强槌击和撕碎的伤害.

sentences.en: Mangle doesn't increase the damage of Maul and Shred anymore.
sentences.cn: 裂伤不再增加重殴和撕碎的伤害.

sentences.en: Shockwave - Maul adds 5 % damage per point.
sentences.cn: 冲击波 - 理想的槌添加5%的伤害每点.

sentences.en: Shockwave - Synergy from Maul adds 5 % damage per point.
sentences.cn: 冲击波 - 理想的槌添加5%的伤害每点.

sentences.en: Shuai Zi followed D elder brother, and clever clever love objects at the same time by father, be mixed odd for D elder brother in the Shuai Zi in basketball game maul, clever clever extremely sad.
sentences.cn: 帅子跟了D哥，和妙妙的爱情同时遭到父亲反对，在篮球比赛中帅子为D哥出头被混混打伤，妙妙伤心欲绝。

sentences.en: To split ( wood ) with a maul and wedge.
sentences.cn: 用长柄重锤或楔劈开 ( 木头 )

trans.tran_en: to strongly criticize something, especially a new book, play etc

trans.tran_cn: 伤害，打伤，粗笨地处理，抨击，用大槌劈开
